    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3

    Facet TotalPrice_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3:TotalPrice_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<TotalPrice xmlns:ota2-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4" xmlns:ph="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1" estimateInd="true" taxExcludedInd="true" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3">

}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Total
        The total price for the offer or order.
        Details
        Type CurrencyAmount
        Example Value 80000
        Required true
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        ProductPrice
        Price for a given Product reference.
        Details
        Type ProductPrice
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 99
        PriceModifiers
        Promotions or discounts applied in the price.
        Details
        Type PriceModifiers
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 99
        Fee
        One or more fees associated with the offer or order.
        Details
        Type Fee
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 99
        Taxes
        Taxes associated with the offer or order.
        Details
        Type Taxes
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        estimateInd
        When true, indicates the total price is an estimate.
        taxExcludedInd
        Taxes are included in the Total price unless this indicator is set. Individual taxes may be excluded by indicating as such on the individual tax item.
